title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
**Unleash Your Inner Yogi with the Ultimate Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat!**

Discover the perfect blend of comfort, support, and style with our premium Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Designed for yoga enthusiasts and fitness enthusiasts alike, this exceptional mat is engineered to provide the ultimate workout experience.

**Experience Unparalleled Comfort:**

Our thick yoga mat boasts a generous 2/5 inch thickness, providing extra cushioning and support for your joints and muscles. Made from high-quality NBR foam, this mat ensures a soft, comfortable, and slip-resistant surface for even the most intense workouts.

**Perfect for Any Fitness Routine:**

Whether you're a yoga beginner or a seasoned Pilates pro, this mat is designed to accommodate a variety of exercises and routines. Its spacious 72"L x 24"W dimensions provide ample room to move, stretch, and flow with ease.

**Convenient and Portable:**

Say goodbye to mat-toting woes! Our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat comes with a convenient Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, making it easy to take your mat with you wherever your fitness journey takes you.

**Key Features:**

* Extra-thick 2/5 inch cushioning for joint support and comfort
* Soft, slip-resistant NBR foam material
* Includes Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap for easy transport
* Suitable for yoga, Pilates, floor exercises, and more
* Teal color adds a pop of style to your workout routine
* Lightweight and easy to clean

**Get Ready to Take Your Fitness to the Next Level!**

Upgrade your workout experience with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Order now and discover a more comfortable, supportive, and convenient way to achieve your fitness goals!

**Unlock Your Full Potential with the Ultimate Yoga Mat Experience!**

Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat, designed to take your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises to the next level! This premium mat offers unparalleled comfort, support, and durability, making it the perfect companion for your fitness journey.

**Extra Thick for Extra Comfort**

Measuring 72 inches long, 24 inches wide, and a generous 2/5 inch thick, this mat provides ample space and cushioning to support your joints and muscles. The soft, NBR foam material ensures a comfortable grip and traction, allowing you to focus on your practice without distractions.

**Easy to Carry, Easy to Use**

The included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap makes it easy to transport your mat to and from the studio or gym. Simply strap it up and go! The strap also helps keep your mat rolled up neatly, making storage a breeze.

**Perfect for Any Fitness Level**

Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, this mat is suitable for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises of all types. Its extra thickness and soft cushioning make it ideal for high-impact activities, while its durable construction ensures it will withstand even the most intense workouts.

**Key Features:**

* Extra thick (2/5 inch) for added comfort and support
* Soft, NBR foam material for a comfortable grip and traction
* Includes Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap for easy transport and storage
* Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises
* Durable construction for long-lasting performance

**Get Ready to Take Your Fitness to New Heights!**

Order your Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat today and experience the comfort, support, and motivation you need to reach your full potential!

**Unleash Your Inner Zen with the Ultimate Yoga Mat Experience!**

Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat, designed to take your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises to the next level! This premium mat offers unparalleled comfort, support, and convenience, making it the perfect companion for your fitness journey.

**Extra Thick for Extra Comfort**

Measuring 72"L x 24"W x 2/5" thick, this mat provides an extra layer of cushioning to protect your joints and provide superior grip, even in the most challenging poses. The soft, NBR foam material ensures a comfortable and stable surface for your practice.

**Soft, Supportive, and Portable**

The included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap makes it easy to take your mat with you wherever you go. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this mat is lightweight and easy to transport, perfect for studio classes, home practice, or travel.

**Perfect for All Levels and Styles**

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, this mat is suitable for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises of all levels. The teal color adds a touch of serenity to your practice, creating a peaceful and calming atmosphere.

**Experience the Difference**

Upgrade your yoga practice with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat. Order now and discover a more comfortable, supportive, and convenient way to connect with your body and mind.

**Key Features:**

* Extra thick (2/5 inch) for added comfort and support
* Soft, NBR foam material for superior grip and cushioning
* Includes Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap for easy transport
* Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises of all levels
* Lightweight (3.11 pounds) and easy to carry
